Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
MARIK-LIAO MARRIAGE CALLED OFF!


Sian, [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]]: Chancellor [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSunTzuLiao],Sun-Tzu Liao]] has officially announced the end of his engagement to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreIsisMarik],Isis Marik]]. Sources close to the chancellor claim that "cultural differences" and "political expediency" are behind the decision. No other details have been forthcoming, but several detachments of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLiaoCCAF],CCAF]] along the border of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]] are reportedly being maintained in a heightened state of readiness.



NERVE AGENTS USED IN ST. IVES CONFLICT!


St. Ives, [[DM.Factions[faction_Ives],St. Ives Compact]]: In what is becoming known as the Black May attacks, a series of nerve  gas attacks by rogue elements of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]] has left the leadership of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Ives],St. Ives Compact]] reeling but unbroken. Sources within both the Compact and the Confederation indicate that the attacks are being carried out by a splinter sect of "[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreThuggee],Thuggee]] cultists" loyal to Kali Liao, sister of Capellan Chancellor [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSunTzuLiao],Sun-Tzu Liao]]. These same sources indicate that Kali Liao has since been remanded into the custody of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague2],Star League]] Council to stand before a war crimes tribunal in Atreus. Retaliatory nerve attacks are likely to continue.


Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: A spokesperson from the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]] Armed Forces has confirmed that the nerve agent being used in the Black May attacks was also responsible for wiping out the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMAC],MAC]] 1st Regiment battalion on Wei in late 3060. The same spokesperson was authorized to confirm that enhanced interrogation of captured [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreThuggee],Thuggee]] terrorists suggests that up to fifteen canisters of nerve agent are yet unaccounted for, with the potential to cause over 5 million casualties. Although the specific formulation of the nerve agent has not been released, previous conflicts on Wei had resulted in the release of a [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague2],Star League]]-era agent designated UrbStryc-A, and mercenary commands deploying to either the vicinity of Wei or the [[DM.Factions[faction_Ives],St. Ives Compact]] are encouraged to take all necessary precautions, including preparation of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCBRN],CBRN-MOPP]] and DeCon gear where applicable.
